00065 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC
00066 #define sched_malloc(size)              rt_malloc((size))
00067 #define sched_free(adr)                 rt_free((adr))
00068 #ifndef CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC_BUILTIN
00069 #define sched_mem_init()
00070 #define sched_mem_end()
00071 #else  /* CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC_BUILTIN */
00072 #define sched_mem_init() \
00073         { if(rt_mem_init() != 0) { \
00074                 printk("Failed to allocate memory for task stack(s)\n"); \
00075                 return(-ENOMEM); \
00076         } }
00077 #define sched_mem_end()                 rt_mem_end()
00078 #endif /* !CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC_BUILTIN */
00079 #define call_exit_handlers(task)                __call_exit_handlers(task)
00080 #define set_exit_handler(task, fun, arg1, arg2) __set_exit_handler(task, fun, arg1, arg2)
00081 #else  /* !CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC */
00082 #define sched_malloc(size)      kmalloc((size), GFP_KERNEL)
00083 #define sched_free(adr)         kfree((adr))
00084 #define sched_mem_init()
00085 #define sched_mem_end()
00086 #define call_exit_handlers(task)
00087 #define set_exit_handler(task, fun, arg1, arg2)
00088 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_MALLOC */

00090 #define RT_SEM_MAGIC 0xaabcdeff
00091 
00092 #define SEM_ERR (0xFfff)
00093 
00094 #define MSG_ERR ((RT_TASK *)0xFfff)
00095 
00096 #define NOTHING ((void *)0)
00097 
00098 #define SOMETHING ((void *)1)

00100 #define SEMHLF 0x0000FFFF
00101 #define RPCHLF 0xFFFF0000
00102 #define RPCINC 0x00010000

00105 #define ASSIGN_RT_CURRENT rt_current = rt_smp_current[cpuid = hard_cpu_id()]
00106 #define RT_CURRENT rt_smp_current[hard_cpu_id()]

00112 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00113 #define rt_time_h (rt_smp_time_h[cpuid & sqilter])
00114 #define oneshot_timer (rt_smp_oneshot_timer[cpuid & sqilter])
00115 #define rt_linux_task (rt_smp_linux_task[cpuid])
00116 #else
00117 #define rt_time_h (rt_smp_time_h[0])
00118 #define oneshot_timer (rt_smp_oneshot_timer[0])
00119 #define rt_linux_task (rt_smp_linux_task[0])

00124 extern unsigned long sqilter;
00125 
00126 #define SCHED_IPI     RTAI_3_IPI
00127 #define SCHED_VECTOR  RTAI_3_VECTOR
00128 
00129 static inline void send_sched_ipi(unsigned long dest)
00130 {
00131 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_ADEOS
00132         unsigned long flags;
00133         arti_hw_lock(flags);
00134 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_ADEOS */
00135         apic_wait_icr_idle();
00136         apic_write_around(APIC_ICR2, SET_APIC_DEST_FIELD(dest));
00137         apic_write_around(APIC_ICR, APIC_DEST_LOGICAL | SCHED_VECTOR);
00138 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_ADEOS
00139         arti_hw_unlock(flags);
00140 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_ADEOS */
00141 }
00142 
00143 #define RT_SCHEDULE_MAP(schedmap) \
00144 do { \
00145         if (sqilter) { \
00146                 if (schedmap) send_sched_ipi(schedmap); \
00147         } else { \
00148                 rt_schedule(); \
00149         } \
00150 } while (0)
00151 
00152 #define RT_SCHEDULE_MAP_BOTH(schedmap) \
00153 do { \
00154         if (sqilter && schedmap) send_sched_ipi(schedmap); \
00155         rt_schedule(); \
00156 } while (0)
00157 
00158 #define RT_SCHEDULE(task, cpuid) \
00159         do { \
00160                 if (((task)->runnable_on_cpus != (cpuid)) && sqilter) { \
00161                         send_sched_ipi(1 << (task)->runnable_on_cpus); \
00162                 } else { \
00163                         rt_schedule(); \
00164                 } \
00165         } while (0)
00166 
00167 #define RT_SCHEDULE_BOTH(task, cpuid) \
00168         { \
00169                 if (((task)->runnable_on_cpus != (cpuid)) && sqilter) { \
00170                         send_sched_ipi(1 << (task)->runnable_on_cpus); \
00171                 } \
00172                 rt_schedule(); \
00173         }
00174 
00175 #else /* !CONFIG_SMP */
00176 
00177 #define send_sched_ipi(dest)
00178 
00179 #define RT_SCHEDULE_MAP_BOTH(schedmap)  rt_schedule()
00180 
00181 #define RT_SCHEDULE_MAP(schedmap)       rt_schedule()
00182 
00183 #define RT_SCHEDULE(task, cpuid)        rt_schedule()
00184 
00185 #define RT_SCHEDULE_BOTH(task, cpuid)   rt_schedule()
00186 
00187 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */
00188 
00189 #define BASE_SOFT_PRIORITY 1000000000
00190 
00191 #define TASK_HARDREALTIME  TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE
00192 
00193 static inline void enq_ready_edf_task(RT_TASK *ready_task)
00194 {
00195         RT_TASK *task;
00196 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00197         task = rt_smp_linux_task[ready_task->runnable_on_cpus & sqilter].rnext;
00198 #else
00199         task = rt_smp_linux_task[0].rnext;
00200 #endif
00201         while (task->policy < 0 && ready_task->period >= task->period) {
00202                 task = task->rnext;
00203         }
00204         task->rprev = (ready_task->rprev = task->rprev)->rnext = ready_task;
00205         ready_task->rnext = task;
00206 }
00207 
00208 #define MAX_WAKEUP_SRQ (2 << 6)
00209 
00210 struct klist_t { volatile int srq, in, out; void *task[MAX_WAKEUP_SRQ]; };
00211 extern struct klist_t wake_up_srq;
00212 
00213 static inline void enq_ready_task(RT_TASK *ready_task)
00214 {
00215         RT_TASK *task;
00216         if (ready_task->is_hard || (ready_task->lnxtsk)->state != TASK_HARDREALTIME) {
00217 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00218                 task = rt_smp_linux_task[ready_task->runnable_on_cpus & sqilter].rnext;
00219 #else
00220                 task = rt_smp_linux_task[0].rnext;
00221 #endif
00222                 while (ready_task->priority >= task->priority) {
00223                         if ((task = task->rnext)->priority < 0) break;
00224                 }
00225                 task->rprev = (ready_task->rprev = task->rprev)->rnext = ready_task;
00226                 ready_task->rnext = task;
00227         } else {
00228                 wake_up_srq.task[wake_up_srq.in] = ready_task->lnxtsk;
00229                 wake_up_srq.in = (wake_up_srq.in + 1) & (MAX_WAKEUP_SRQ - 1);
00230                 rt_pend_linux_srq(wake_up_srq.srq);
00231         }
00232 }
00233 
00234 static inline int renq_ready_task(RT_TASK *ready_task, int priority)
00235 {
00236         int retval;
00237         if ((retval = ready_task->priority != priority)) {
00238                 ready_task->priority = priority;
00239                 if (ready_task->state == RT_SCHED_READY) {
00240                         (ready_task->rprev)->rnext = ready_task->rnext;
00241                         (ready_task->rnext)->rprev = ready_task->rprev;
00242                         enq_ready_task(ready_task);
00243                 }
00244         }
00245         return retval;
00246 }
00247 
00248 static inline int renq_current(RT_TASK *rt_current, int priority)
00249 {
00250         int retval;
00251         if ((retval = rt_current->priority != priority)) {
00252                 rt_current->priority = priority;
00253                 (rt_current->rprev)->rnext = rt_current->rnext;
00254                 (rt_current->rnext)->rprev = rt_current->rprev;
00255                 enq_ready_task(rt_current);
00256         }
00257         return retval;
00258 }
00259 
00260 static inline void rem_ready_task(RT_TASK *task)
00261 {
00262         if (task->state == RT_SCHED_READY) {
00263                 if (!task->is_hard) {
00264                         struct task_struct *proc;
00265                         (proc = task->lnxtsk)->state = TASK_HARDREALTIME;
00266                         proc->rt_priority = (2*BASE_SOFT_PRIORITY - 1) - task->priority;
00267                 }
00268                 (task->rprev)->rnext = task->rnext;
00269                 (task->rnext)->rprev = task->rprev;
00270         }
00271 }
00272 
00273 static inline void rem_ready_current(RT_TASK *rt_current)
00274 {
00275         if (!rt_current->is_hard) {
00276                 struct task_struct *proc;
00277                 (proc = rt_current->lnxtsk)->state = TASK_HARDREALTIME;
00278                 proc->rt_priority = (2*BASE_SOFT_PRIORITY - 1) - rt_current->priority;
00279         }
00280         (rt_current->rprev)->rnext = rt_current->rnext;
00281         (rt_current->rnext)->rprev = rt_current->rprev;
00282 }
00283 
00284 static inline void enq_timed_task(RT_TASK *timed_task)
00285 {
00286         RT_TASK *task;
00287         if (!timed_task->is_hard) {
00288                 (timed_task->lnxtsk)->state = TASK_HARDREALTIME;
00289         }
00290 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00291         task = rt_smp_linux_task[timed_task->runnable_on_cpus & sqilter].tnext;
00292 #else
00293         task = rt_smp_linux_task[0].tnext;
00294 #endif
00295         while (timed_task->resume_time > task->resume_time) {
00296                 task = task->tnext;
00297         }
00298         task->tprev = (timed_task->tprev = task->tprev)->tnext = timed_task;
00299         timed_task->tnext = task;
00300 }
00301 
00302 static inline void wake_up_timed_tasks(int cpuid)
00303 {
00304         RT_TASK *task;
00305 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00306         task = rt_smp_linux_task[cpuid = cpuid & sqilter].tnext;
00307 #else
00308         task = rt_smp_linux_task[0].tnext;
00309 #endif
00310         while (task->resume_time <= rt_time_h) {
00311                 if ((task->state &= ~(RT_SCHED_DELAYED | RT_SCHED_SEMAPHORE | RT_SCHED_RECEIVE | RT_SCHED_SEND | RT_SCHED_RPC | RT_SCHED_RETURN | RT_SCHED_MBXSUSP)) == RT_SCHED_READY) {
00312                         if (task->policy < 0) {
00313                                 enq_ready_edf_task(task);
00314                         } else {
00315                                 enq_ready_task(task);
00316                         }
00317                 }
00318                 task = task->tnext;
00319         }
00320 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00321         rt_smp_linux_task[cpuid].tnext = task;
00322         task->tprev = &rt_smp_linux_task[cpuid];
00323 #else
00324         rt_smp_linux_task[0].tnext = task;
00325         task->tprev = &rt_smp_linux_task[0];
00326 #endif
00327 }
00328 
00329 static inline void rem_timed_task(RT_TASK *task)
00330 {
00331         if ((task->state & RT_SCHED_DELAYED)) {
00332                 (task->tprev)->tnext = task->tnext;
00333                 (task->tnext)->tprev = task->tprev;
00334         }
00335 }
00336 
00337 static inline RTIME get_time(void)
00338 {
00339 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00340         if (sqilter) {
00341                 int cpuid;
00342                 return rt_smp_oneshot_timer[cpuid = hard_cpu_id()] ? rdtsc() : rt_smp_times[cpuid].tick_time;
00343         } else {
00344                 return rt_smp_oneshot_timer[0] ? rdtsc(): rt_times.tick_time;
00345         }
00346 #else
00347         return oneshot_timer ? rdtsc(): rt_times.tick_time;
00348 #endif
00349 }
00350 
00351 static inline void enqueue_blocked(RT_TASK *task, QUEUE *queue, int qtype)
00352 {
00353         QUEUE *q;
00354         task->blocked_on = (q = queue);
00355         if (!qtype) {
00356                 while ((q = q->next) != queue && (q->task)->priority <= task->priority);
00357         }
00358         q->prev = (task->queue.prev = q->prev)->next  = &(task->queue);
00359         task->queue.next = q;
00360 }
00361 
00362 
00363 static inline void dequeue_blocked(RT_TASK *task)
00364 {
00365         task->prio_passed_to     = NOTHING;
00366         (task->queue.prev)->next = task->queue.next;
00367         (task->queue.next)->prev = task->queue.prev;
00368         task->blocked_on         = NOTHING;
00369 }
00370 
00371 static __volatile__ inline unsigned long pass_prio(RT_TASK *to, RT_TASK *from)
00372 {
00373         QUEUE *q;
00374 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00375         unsigned long schedmap;
00376         schedmap = 0;
00377 #endif
00378         from->prio_passed_to = to;
00379         while (to && to->priority > from->priority) {
00380                 to->priority = from->priority;
00381                 if (to->state == RT_SCHED_READY) {
00382                         (to->rprev)->rnext = to->rnext;
00383                         (to->rnext)->rprev = to->rprev;
00384                         enq_ready_task(to);
00385 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00386                         set_bit(to->runnable_on_cpus & 0x1F, &schedmap);
00387 #endif
00388                 } else if ((q = to->blocked_on) && !((to->state & RT_SCHED_SEMAPHORE) &&
00389  ((SEM *)q)->qtype)) {
00390                         (to->queue.prev)->next = to->queue.next;
00391                         (to->queue.next)->prev = to->queue.prev;
00392                         while ((q = q->next) != to->blocked_on && (q->task)->priority <= to->priority);
00393                         q->prev = (to->queue.prev = q->prev)->next  = &(to->queue);
00394                         to->queue.next = q;
00395                 }
00396                 to = to->prio_passed_to;
00397         }
00398 #ifdef CONFIG_SMP
00399         return schedmap;
00400 #else
00401         return 0;
00402 #endif
00403 }
00404 
00405 static inline void __call_exit_handlers(RT_TASK *task)
00406 {
00407         XHDL *pt, *tmp;
00408 
00409         pt = task->ExitHook; // Initialise ExitHook in rt_task_init()
00410         while ( pt ) {
00411                 (*pt->fun) (pt->arg1, pt->arg2);
00412                 tmp = pt;
00413                 pt  = pt->nxt;
00414                 rt_free(tmp);
00415         }
00416         task->ExitHook = 0;
00417 }
00418 
00419 static inline XHDL *__set_exit_handler(RT_TASK *task, void (*fun) (void *, int), void *arg1, int arg2)
00420 {
00421         XHDL *p;
00422 
00423         // exit handler functions are automatically executed at terminattion time by rt_task_delete()
00424         // in the reverse order they were created (like C++ destructors behave).
00425         if (task->magic != RT_TASK_MAGIC) return 0;
00426         if (!(p = (XHDL *) rt_malloc (sizeof(XHDL)))) return 0;
00427         p->fun  = fun;
00428         p->arg1 = arg1;
00429         p->arg2 = arg2;
00430         p->nxt  = task->ExitHook;
00431         return (task->ExitHook = p);
00432 }
